name: Laura M.
text: Ranger came home tired, clean, and so content. Juli's trail updates and structured playdates were perfect for his working-dog brain.

name: Devon P.
text: Miso can be nervous with new people, but Juli's gradual introductions and Maple the Lab made her feel instantly safe.

name: Angelica R.
text: Loved the twice-daily videos and wellness notes. The fenced yard and splash spot kept Churro entertained the whole weekend.

name: Sam H.
text: Kona came home happy, calm, and freshly brushed. The paw balm add-on was worth every penny.
